snippet: Mr. Robbins, 76, said his book, titled "Tibetan Peach Pie,'' would tell the stories from his colorful life, beginning in the Appalachian hills and across the continents of Asia and Africa.
abstract: Mr. Robbins, 76, said his book, titled "Tibetan Peach Pie,'' would tell the stories from his colorful life, beginning in the Appalachian hills and across the continents of Asia and Africa.

headline.main: Ecco to Publish Memoir by Tom Robbins
headline.print_headline: Ecco to Publish Memoir By Tom Robbins
